item.title: New Ghosts 'N Goblins on Kickstarter
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Normally those lil’ Kickstarter videos actually make me want to put money into the project (but I never do, anyway)…

But not this video. This video makes the dev team look like a bunch of incompetent pisstakers. I doubt they’ll get this funded (and I hope they don’t).

Read full topic
